```{r fns}
make_rectangular <- function(.data) {
  map_dfr(.data, ~ tibble(!!!.x))
}


ui_list <- function(vec) {
  for (x in vec) {
    cat("-", x, "\n")
  }
}
```


```{r staffs}
dat <- read_yaml("_course.yml")
team_df <- make_rectangular(dat$team)
schedule_df <- make_rectangular(dat$schedule)
timetable_df <- make_rectangular(dat$timetable)
nlecturer <- sum(team_df$role == "lecturer")
ntutor <- sum(team_df$role == "tutor")
```

There are no lectures or tutorials during reading week.

```{r}
schedule_df <- schedule_df %>%
  mutate(
    lecture = file.exists(sprintf("slides/lecture-%.2d.html", week))
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    slides = case_when(
      lecture ~ glue("<a class='fa fa-link' href='slides/{sprintf(\"lecture-%.2d.html\", week)}' target='_blank'></a> / <a class='fa fa-file-pdf' href='lectures/{sprintf(\"lecture-%.2d.pdf\", week)}' target='_blank'></a>"),
      TRUE ~ ""
    ),
    topic = ifelse(is.na(topic), "", topic),
    assessment = ifelse(is.na(assessment), "", assessment)
  ) %>%
  select(week, topic, slides, assessment)


midsem_break <- 6 # after which week

schedule_df %>%
  kable(
    escape = FALSE, align = c("c", "c", "c", "c"),
    col.names = c(
      "Week", "Topic", "Slides", "Assessments"
    )
  ) %>%
  kable_styling(
    bootstrap_options = "striped",
    fixed_thead = T
  ) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "0.5cm") %>%
 # column_spec(2, width = "3cm") %>%
 # column_spec(3, width = "cm") %>%
  group_rows("Reading week Break (1 week)", midsem_break + 1, 12, label_row_css = "background-color: #d9e1e8;") %>%
  add_indent(1:midsem_break) # this needs to be done to match up with above
```
